# game name
title: "Jumping Rope"

# icon or image for the game
image:
 name: 03_rope.png
 alt-text: "A screenshot showing an illustration of a landscape with mountains, trees, and clouds. There is message saying Game Over."

# short description of the game

description: "Jump the rope using the double tap. The double tap is the gesture used by Talkback to select options. In this game you will be able to practice the gesture while having fun trying to 'beat' your high score."

# links
links:
 - name: Download
   url: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.FCUL.Corda

# release information

year: 2021
platform: "Android"
devices: "Touchscreen"
language: "Portuguese"
players: "Single-player"
accessibility: "The gameplay presents an auditory challenge where the player has to perform a gesture to respond to audio feedback."
